name: liftjs
description: lift.js is a compact monad opinionated javascript library
tags: monad, monoid, macroid, just, validation, maybe, unit, functional programming

scripts.prepublish: node_modules/.bin/babel src/lift.js -o npm/lift-min.js --minified && copy /y src/lift.js npm/lift.js
scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/babel src/lift.js -o test/lift.js && node_modules/.bin/babel test --out-dir babel && node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha babel

author: pre63
